DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Infant infantmother pair good health Infant infantmother pair smokefree home Infant singleton , full term birth weight > 2490 g Between 0 17 day age enrollment Human milk fed infant must exclusively human milkfed since birth ; formula fed infant must receive Similac Advance Similac Sensitive since birth Parents confirm intention administer vitamin mineral supplement ( exclude vitamin mineral supplement contain vitamin D ) , solid food juice infant enrollment throughout study An adverse maternal , fetal infant medical history , include gestational diabetes think investigator potential effect tolerance , growth , and/or development .
